definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
"mercenary expert", a person who is supposedly an independent expert, but receives payment for making comments favorable to a particular entity

sentences.english: Some experts consider that E -magazine and paper magazine will supplement each other.
sentences.chinese: 业内专家认为，网络杂志和纸介杂志将相辅相承。

sentences.english: Experts said the study should prompt countries to reconsider how they classify drugs.
sentences.chinese: 专家称，这项研究应该促使各国重新考虑药品的分类。

sentences.english: Nutrition for Foodservice and Culinary Professionals, Study Guide, 6th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 食品服务和厨房专家所需营养，研究指导，第六版。

sentences.english: This paper presents a traditional Chinese medical expert consultation system named ZRK82.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一个名为ZRK82的中医专家咨询系统。

sentences.english: We are reading the Shuobo and partial expert scholar, a strong lineup.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在读硕博及部分专家学者，阵容强大。

sentences.english: And he has discovered many such grass-roots experts on douban. com.
sentences.chinese: 而且他在豆瓣网上已经找到了许多这样的草根专家。

sentences.english: But some experts cautioned that the science in the study is still very early.
sentences.chinese: 但有些专家申饬说，研究的学科仍在初期。

sentences.english: You won't signify in such a thing,he's the specialist.
sentences.chinese: 在这种专业上你别假充内行了，他才是专家。

sentences.english: Buy the pass on a message of sina to Microsoft general, the expert inside course of study expresses generally open-eyed .
sentences.chinese: 对微软将收购新浪的传言，业内专家普遍表示惊讶。

sentences.english: You may have to do a little self-promotion, but try not to come off as a braggart.
sentences.chinese: 你可以做点自我推销，但是不要过了头成了牛皮专家。

sentences.english: Dr. Raymond and Dorothy Moore are professionals known around the world;
sentences.chinese: 雷蒙德和多萝西摩尔博士是世界知名的教育专家。

sentences.english: So why, then, do we blindly follow experts?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么我们还盲目追崇专家呢？

sentences.english: CEG will initiate new supplier qualification process if required.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要，专家团将启动供应商认证流程。

sentences.english: Tommy said that he was dehumanized by his teachers, psychiatrists, and social workers.
sentences.chinese: 托米说他受到老师，精神病专家和社工的非人道对待。

sentences.english: Small and portable, the iron cauldron was once used as a field cauldron, according to experts.
sentences.chinese: 据专家介绍铁釜是一种行军锅，它体积小，便于携带。

sentences.english: The rich lode of Web data, experts warn, has its perils.
sentences.chinese: 专家警告称，网络数据数量巨大也有其弊端。

definition: research/a study/CL:項|项[xiang4]/to research/to look into
the head of an institution whose name ends in 院[yuan4]/chair of a board/president of a university/department head/dean/premier of the Republic of China/CL:個|个[ge4]
